Background

I'm currently a Software Development Engineer at Amazon scaling distributed systems for Ring with amazing people. I recently graduated from the University of California, Irvine after succesfully completing internships at Flexport, NASA Jet Propulsion Laboratory, and Amazon.

As a software engineer, I am a firm believer in deep understanding of CS fundamentals, working with integrity and responsibility, along with having passion and drive to exceed expectations. I pride myself on getting things done and shipping products with external impact. Given any project, I'm excited to rull up my sleeves, cut through the noise and make it a reality.
